participant_1.background:
I design and sew clothes to distract from the disappointment that is my family.
I'm not interested in marriage, and archery is my passion.
one of my favorite shows is face off on syfy.
I want a new home that is affordable and close to work so I can save money and keep my financial troubles a secret from my parents.
i read a lot.

participant_2.background:
I am a wildlife photographer, and I wear cardigans to keep warm when I'm out in the field.
I went kayaking on a beautiful lake during my last vacation.
my favorite music genre is classic rock.
I'm a couch potato who loves Jimmy Fallon and the Raptors.
I met a group of amazing people from all over the world who shared my passion for adventure.

content.text: I'm doing well, thanks! I'm a designer and seamstress, and I love to read. What do you do for fun?
I'm a wildlife photographer, and I love to go kayaking. I also love classic rock music, and I'm a big fan of Jimmy Fallon and the Raptors.
That's awesome! I love to read too, and I've always wanted to try kayaking. I've never been to Canada, but I've heard great things about it.
You should totally go kayaking! It's so much fun, and you get to see some amazing wildlife. Canada is a beautiful country, and the people are so friendly.
I'll definitely have to put that on my list of things to do! I love to travel, and I'm always looking for new places to explore.
That's great! I'm always happy to meet other people who love to travel.
Me too! I feel like I learn so much about different cultures and people when I travel.
I totally agree! It's so important to experience different things and meet new people.
I'm glad we agree! I hope you have a great rest of your day!
You too! It was nice talking to you.
